#include <iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<set>
#include<vector>
#include<string>
#include<strings.h>
#include<map>
#include<iterator>
#include<string.h>
#define ll long long int
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    ll tc;
    cin>>tc;
    while(tc--)
    {
        char arr[1010];
        cin>>arr;
        ll sum=0;
        ll l=strlen(arr);
        ll i;
        for(i=0;i<l;i++)
        {
            if(arr[i]>=48&&arr[i]<=57)
            {
                sum=sum+(arr[i]-48);
            }
        }
        cout<<sum<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
